body_html:
Hmm it looks like the crash comes earlier. Running with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 gets me

$ CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 python cublas.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "cublas.py", line 71, in <module>
    out_put = model(x)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 491, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "cublas.py", line 26, in forward
    out,_ = self.lstm(x)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 491, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 192, in forward
    output, hidden = func(input, self.all_weights, hx, batch_sizes)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 323, in forward
    return func(input, *fargs, **fkwargs)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 287, in forward
    dropout_ts)
RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED

Maybe the inputs are bad, will check those.

body:
Hmm it looks like the crash comes earlier. Running with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 gets me
```
$ CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 python cublas.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "cublas.py", line 71, in <module>
    out_put = model(x)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 491, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "cublas.py", line 26, in forward
    out,_ = self.lstm(x)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 491, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/modules/rnn.py", line 192, in forward
    output, hidden = func(input, self.all_weights, hx, batch_sizes)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 323, in forward
    return func(input, *fargs, **fkwargs)
  File "/home/rzou/pytorch/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py", line 287, in forward
    dropout_ts)
RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED
```
Maybe the inputs are bad, will check those.
